name: The Kingdom of Thalrathis
description: The lore of Thalrathis is rich with the stories of ancient civilizations, powerful gods, and the ever-present clash between light and darkness. It holds the secrets of the worldâ€™s origins, the rise and fall of empires, and the mysteries that continue to shape the land. Understanding its history offers insight into the forces that govern magic, race, and destiny within this magical realm.
